channel.title: Drawing Tablets
channel.description:
Been looking for drawing tablets recently just wondering what are some good ones under $60 I'm only going to be using it to dick around with photoshop and paint and stuff so I'd prefer it to be not too expensive.
so far i am leaning toward ordering this [url]https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16823102015[/url]

item.title: Drawing Tablets
item.dc:creator: Daedalus
item.description:
Dr. Perky:

yeah i misread. damn them to hell. and there confusing me. still 55 bucks is decent

Indeed it is. I think mine was 80 euros or something like that. But that was 2 years ago.

I’d take it

item.title: Drawing Tablets
item.dc:creator: Dr_Perky
item.description:
Daedalus:

I hope 9 dollars above the 60 isn’t too bad?

https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16823100045

You gotsta get a Wacom!
Got that one myself. It’s fantastic. Do yourself a favour and get that one.
It’s well worth the 69 dollars.

If you buy a pen tablet you might aswell buy a good one. Been using this one for a good 2 years now.
Still works like a dream. It’s a great size, even though it seems small. I doubt I’ll need a new one until this one explodes or something.
I don’t know about that Genius tablet. I’ve never even heard of the brand to be honest.
Make sure you don’t buy something you regret later.

just checked amazon is selling that model for only 25 bucks so i am totally getting it

Read full topic
